name: azure-cognitiveservices-speech
summary: Microsoft Cognitive Services Speech SDK for Python

chunks.text:
For an introduction to this package, have a look at `the quickstart
article `_.

For information about the Speech Service, please refer to `its
website `_.

Documentation
-------------

API documentation for this package can be found `here `_.

License information
-------------------

- `Microsoft Software License Terms for the Speech SDK `_
- `Third party notices `_

usage_description: This library is used to develop Python applications that utilize the Azure Cognitive Services Speech capabilities, enabling developers to build speech-to-text and text-to-speech functionality into their projects. With this library, developers can easily integrate speech recognition and synthesis into their applications.
